org.opends.server.replication.server

Class ExternalChangeLogSessionImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.replication.server.ExternalChangeLogSessionImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExternalChangeLogSession

    public class ExternalChangeLogSessionImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExternalChangeLogSession
    This class implements a session used to search the external changelog in the Directory Server.

        public ExternalChangeLogSessionImpl(ReplicationServer rs,
                            StartECLSessionMsg startECLSessionMsg)
                             throws DirectoryException
        Create a new external changelog session.
        Parameters:
        rs - The replication server to which we will request the log.
        startECLSessionMsg - The start session message containing the details of the search request on the ECL.
        Throws:
        DirectoryException - When an error occurs.
